name: Gamera's Binding
description:
A game made for The Mini Game Jam #81

IMPORTANT: When you first start off and when you get close to the necromancer click on the small icon that appears on top of him to talk to him

You play as a victim of a necromancer that forces you to defeat a beast to earn your freedom.

Your death is not the end... every time you die you come back with a certain debuff.

When you die and come back with a debuff.. you gain more points from killing enemies the player has to choose if they want to have more debuffs and get a higher score and have a higher risk to lose the boss fight or play it safe.

Game developed by DevNugget on YouTube
